item.title: How do i make money after you kill a npc, make all the money go together?

not give away ugh… when the npcs drop the money the drop ex. 1st slot 1 gp, 2nd slot 1gp, 3rd slot 1 gp, and etc…

item.title: How do i make money after you kill a npc, make all the money go together?
item.dc:creator: @people people
item.description:
@people wrote:

I’m not positive, but was there no spaces in your inventory, but you still had coins there? ex. 1 slot has coins, the other 27 have… mantas… Something like that has happened to me, and I just ate a manta, and the coins were stacking again!

I hope this is what you were asking, your question confused me a little bit 0.o

Read full topic
